title: Creamy potato and pasta salad
ingredients: ['2.25kg potatoes, unpeeled', '12 eggs', '450g uncooked fusilli pasta', '2/3 (670g) jar dill pickled cucumbers, chopped (reserve juice)', '2 bunches spring onions, chopped', '750ml mayonnaise or to taste', '2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce', '4 tablespoons dill pickle juice or as needed', 'salt and pepper to taste']
